name: Add new timeBuzzer activities to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet as a new row
description: Every time a new activity is created in timeBuzzer, Make will automatically add it to a selected Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet as a new row. The template uses this [example worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AnDK8KmbvjyFkD65TCVXKv3NiLhf?e=QXuzqY).
